response:
"wie kann man noch heute davon sprechen, dass die privatsphäre tot ist? die meisten menschen wissen nicht einmal, wie viel persönliche information sie täglich preisgeben. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #digitalerfrieden"

translation: "how can we still talk about privacy being dead? most people don't even know how much personal information they give away every day. #dataprotection #privacy #digitalpeace"

this post critically examines the idea that privacy is no longer a viable concept in today's digital age. it suggests that many people are unaware of the extent to which their personal information is being shared and exploited, and calls for greater awareness and protection of individual privacy rights. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #digitalerfrieden (digital peace) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics.
